General.Name: International Public Partnership
General.Description: International Public Partnerships Limited specializes in investments in broader infrastructure sector with a focus on public or social infrastructure. The fund seeks acquisition opportunities that may be single assets, portfolios, shares in companies, or interest in partnerships. It also seeks to invest in private finance initiative and public private partnerships procurement model for public infrastructure in developed countries. The firm invests in opportunities both in United Kingdom and internationally.
General.Address: 3 More London Riverside, London, United Kingdom, SE1 2AQ
